name: Guide
description: You came of age in the outdoors, far from settled lands. Your home? Anywhere you chose to unfurl your bedroll. There are wonders on the frontier-strange monsters, prestine forests, and winding rivers-and you learned to fend for yourself as you explored them.
equipment: Arrow (20), bedroll, cartographer's tools, fishing tackle, quiver, shortbow, tent, traveler's clothes, 2 gp.
